synopsis.text: Tom is a courageous cat who embarks on a big adventure to save the world alongside his loyal companions. This heartwarming tale is based on the beloved children's book series "The Adventures of Tom the Small Cat", written by author Masumi Iino and brought to life through illustrations by artist Yumiko Imai. In celebration of the 22nd anniversary of the book series' completion, a short animated film adaptation titled "Chibi Neko Tomu's Big Adventure" was shown in theaters across Tollywood from December 20th 2014 to January 5th 2015. Thanks to a successful crowdfunding campaign on MotionGallery, the film was later released on Blu-ray in Japan in 2015. Through Tom's thrilling journey captured in this anime adaptation, viewers are sure to be delighted and inspired by the themes of friendship, bravery and triumph over adversity. With beautiful animation and a timeless story, this film promises to appeal to audiences young and old who enjoy heartfelt adventure tales.
